did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse ca. 1935, 1959-1978 and 1992-2003
did.physdesc: This addition to the papers of Alan Cheuse, ca. 1935, 1959-1978 and 1992-2003, consists of ca. 1,450 items (ca. 730 items in the correspondence series, 515 items in manuscripts, and 200 items in topical; 18 Hollinger boxes and one oversize folder).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse, Accession #10726-t, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were purchased by the University of Virginia Library on September 11, 2003, from Alan Cheuse, George Mason University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of Alan Cheuse, ca. 1935, 1959-1978 and 1992-2003, ca. 1,450 items (ca. 730 items in the correspondence series, 515 items in manuscripts, and 200 items in topical; 18 Hollinger boxes and one oversize folder) includes book reviews, short stories, articles, essays, and novels by Cheuse; two sets of proofs for Listening to the Page, date books; correspondence, postcards, and invitations; articles about Cheuse; and manuscripts by Nicholas Delbanco, Peter Najarian, and other authors. All materials stored on computer discs were printed and interfiled; the file date and disk number are written on the upper right corner of the first page of each document.

Correspondents include, from correspondence: Adler, Irving (2002 Dec 10); Aldridge, John W. (2000 Jun 11; 2000 Jul 14; 2000 Jul 24; 2000 Dec 7); Atlas, James (2000 Dec 4); Bacon, Charlotte (2000 Apr 13); Boyle, T. C. (2001 Sep 6); Byrd, Max (2000 May 23); Callanan, Liam (2001 Sep 9; 2002 n.d.); Canin, Ethan (2000 Jan 21); Cheney, Vice President Richard (2002 Jan 25); Ciabattari, Jane (2002 Apr 15); Clair, Maxine (2002 Jan 9); Collum, Danny Duncan (2001 Nov 27); Craig, Charmaine (2003 Feb 28); Cull, Mark E. (1999 Dec 6); Danticat, Edwidge (1999 Jun 19); Davis, W. Bowdoin (2001 Oct 15); DeBord, Matthew (2000 Jan 26); Delbanco, Nicholas and Elena (2001 May 25; 2001 Nov 1; 2002 Jan 23; 2002 Apr 3; 2002 Nov 29; n.d.); Evans, Elizabeth (2001 Jan 12); Fogarty, Robert (1999 Nov 30; 2000 Oct 18; 2001 Jan 20); Ford, Richard (2001 Nov 17); Fraser, Russell (2001 May 8; 2002 Feb 1); Free, Pamela (1999 Sep 15); Garrett, George (2002 Jul 11); Gerard, Philip (2002 Apr 11); Giardina, Anthony (2001 Mar 29); Gibbon, Maureen (2000 Apr 10); Giles, Molly (2000 Sep 29; 2001 Feb 6); Gililand, Gail (2002 Feb 28); Gold, Herbert (2001 Apr 27; 2001 May 10; 2001 May 21; 2002 Mar 25; 2002 May 13); Hall, Oakley (2001 Nov 30; 2002 Mar 6; 2002 Jul 8; 2003 Apr 2); Hall, Sands (2000 Oct 28; 2000 Nov 17); Hartman, Mary (2002 Oct 20); Henry, DeWitt (2001 Dec 9); Hirschfield, Jane (2000 Oct 9); Houston, James and Jeanne Wakatsuki (2000 Jan 25; 2001 Feb 1; 2001 Apr 4; 2001 Sep); Hower, Edward (2003 Jan 27); Jensen, Lisa (2001 Sep 11); Jin, Ha (1999 Oct 30); Koch, Stephen (2003 Apr, n.d.); Landis, J. James (1999 Aug 31); Thornton, Susan (2001 Jan 8); Vaz, Katherine (2000 Sep 19); Wagman, Diana (1999 Oct 5); White, Michael C. arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in four series: Series I: Works by Alan Cheuse (Boxes 1-14); Series II: Works by Other Writers (Boxes 14-15); Series III: Correspondence (Boxes 15-17); and Series IV: Topical Files (Boxes 17-18).
